mentor.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an experienced person who advises and helps a less experienced person
mentor.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Now she mentors undergraduates who are training to be teachers.
mentor.translation[2].definitions[0].def: an experienced person who gives advice to less experienced people to help them in their work
mentor.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: He now runs his own company and is a mentor to other young entrepreneurs.
